name: Easter Sunday Rangitoto Trip
description: This Easter Sunday we’re organising a a club trip to Rangitoto! There will be group lunch. There will be fun in the sun. There will be walking. And of course there will be training!
extendedDescription: This Easter Sunday we’re organising a a club trip to Rangitoto! The dance studio will still be booked for regular training for those who can’t make it. There will be group lunch. There will be fun in the sun. There will be walking. And of course there will be training! Make sure you pack your own lunch, sunblock, appropriate shoes for light hiking and a fighting spirit. Training will be done in mufti so don’t worry you don’t need to wear your uniform in public (unless of course you want to). It’s gonna be a good time and there will be plenty of opportunities to snap photos for the ‘gram so get a move on and sign up! Cost: $36 for the return ferry ticket Schedule: We will be meeting at the Britomart Ferry Terminal at 8.50am. The ferry leaves at 9.15am so don’t be late! We will returning from Rangitoto as a group at 4pm.  There is an earlier ferry at 2.30pm for those who need to get home early. (Note: If we get less than 5 people signed up, then the trip won’t go ahead)

name: 2019 Karate Camp
description: The club will be running it's annual Karate camp again this year. More info to come.

name: Courses & Careers Day 2018
description: The club will be performing at Courses and Careers Day

name: The Goju Guys Seminar
description: A training seminar focusing on ‘Goju‘ karate as presented by practitioners from different Goju schools.

name: 2019 National Gasshuku
description: One of New Zealands top MMA fighters and Goju Ryu practitioners Gareth Lewis will be teaching

name: 2018 Taira Sensei Seminar
description: Taira Masaji Sensei, 9th dan from Okinawa, will be coming to Auckland to host a seminar.

name: 40th IOGKF Sekai Budosai
description: The 40th IOGKF Sekai Budosai (World Budo Festival) is a week long training camp hosted in Okinawa, taught by some of IOGKF's most skilled and highest ranked members.

name: Semester 1 Grading
description: Our first grading of the year will occur near the end of semester one.

name: Semester 2 Grading
description: Our second grading of the year will occur near the end of semester two.

name: End of Year Beach Training
description: Training at the beach to wrap things up for the year. Lunch afterwards.
extendedDescription: We'll be having a beach training at Mission Bay after our final Rec Center training. We'll be having a enf of year lunch afterwards. Remember to bring sunblock and a towel! Sunglasses/sunhats are optional.

name: Taira Seminar Pre-Training
location: Pakuranga Goju Ryu, Sunnyhills Primary School
description: Free pre-training before the seminar. Runs from 7pm - 8pm, however feel free to show up from 6pm to do your own thing before the adults training starts.
extendedDescription: Runs form 7pm till 8pm. Covers the core drills that are used in Taira Sensei's teaching method. Hosted by Sennen Sensei at Pakuranga Goju Ryu, Sunnyhills Primary School, Pakuranag. Contact Matt for more details.

name: Avengers: Endgame Screening
description: This is a club viewing of Avengers: Endgame. After training we will head for lunch and then the cinemas. Session times aren’t out yet but the movie will likely start at 1.45pm or 2.45pm.
